features: INTENSE CONDITIONING: Use our Daily Miracle Shampoo infused with Keratin to help nourish and strengthen hair when it's most vulnerable
PREVENT BREAKAGE: Avoid excessive tangling and save your hair from the unnecessary stress of brushing
HEAT PROTECTANT: Infused with ingredients to help protect your hair from thermal styling and natural-causing damage
SAFE FOR COLORED HAIR: Seals and preserves hair color
SULFATE FREE: Thanks to all natural ingredients, our Miracle Shampoo cleans hair and restores scalp health without leaving it feeling dry and brittle

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: For everyday use For everyday use For everyday use For everyday use Sulfate Free Formula ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Adds Shine ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ UV, Environmental & Thermal Protectant ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Improve Elasticity & Reduces Breakage ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Preserves Hair Color, Improves Vibrancy ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Hydrates, Restores & Seals In Moisture Balance For Cuticle Strengthening ✓ Keratin Protein Enriched ✓ No Added Sulfates ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ What Makes Us Different: Essential cleansing for everyday use, this shampoo delivers softer more manageable hair with each & every use. KERATIN the building block protein that makes up all hair, This Shampoo builds stronger hair to guard against brittleness. Ideal for hair that has had Keratin and/or straightening treatments. A daily shampoo that’s designed to address the special needs of platinum blondes, ash blondes and every blonde in between. Brightening Shampoo enhances highlights and refreshes golden hues with a gentle cleansing that protects against fading. SILK sets the standards. We've infused Silk Proteins to make hair smooth as glass. Excellent as a therapeutic shampoo, but light enough for everyday use. IT'S A 10 TIP/Directions: Work shampoo into a lather, focusing on roots and scalp. Rinse with warm water. Follow with any It's a 10 Miracle Daily Conditioner or Hair Mask treatment. Gently work shampoo into hair from scalp to ends. Massage to build lather. Rinse thoroughly and repeat if desired. Follow with any It's a 10 Miracle Daily Conditioner or Hair Mask treatment. Apply to wet hair and massage in thoroughly. Leave in 60-90 seconds according to degree of brightening desired, and rinse. Follow with Its a 10’s Five Minute Hair Repair for Blondes and Miracle Leave-in for Blondes Gently work shampoo into hair from scalp to ends. Massage to build lather. Rinse thoroughly and repeat if desired. Follow with any It's a 10 Miracle Daily Conditioner or Hair Mask treatment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Reliable Deep Conditioner great for Longer, Thick, and Course Hair
reviews.reviewText: The It's A 10 Miracle Shampoo Plus Keratin in the 33.8-ounce size has won my heart as an absolute hair care game-changer. I'm thoroughly impressed with its performance and the thoughtful packaging.**Larger Size Advantage:** Having a larger size option like this is a dream come true for someone with long, thick, and coarse hair like mine. This shampoo not only handles the demands of my hair but exceeds expectations, leaving it feeling rejuvenated and vibrant.**Value and Quality Balance:** While the price might raise an eyebrow, the exceptional quality of this shampoo easily justifies the expense. Every wash feels like a treat, as the formula works its magic to strengthen and nourish my hair. It's clear that I'm paying for a product that delivers on its promises.**Online Convenience and Savings:** One standout advantage of purchasing this product online is the potential for cost savings. Oftentimes, the online option offers a more budget-friendly alternative compared to the price tag found in physical stores. It's a win-win situation for both quality and savings.**Shipping and Packaging:** Kudos to the shipping process – Most often it's been securely packed with bubble wrap in a slightly larger box. The added touch of wrapping it in plastic showcases attention to detail. Not only does this protect the contents from leaks, but it's also a practical option for those who like to make the most of every drop.In conclusion, the It's A 10 Miracle Shampoo Plus Keratin in the 33.8-ounce size has seamlessly integrated into my hair care routine. Its larger size option is a godsend, catering perfectly to my hair type. While it's true that the price is higher, the exceptional quality and online savings make it a worthy investment. The packaging ensures a safe arrival, with a thoughtful touch for even the most frugal-minded. If you're on the hunt for a shampoo that truly performs, this one ticks all the boxes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good, not best
reviews.reviewText: I adore the It's a 10 Miracle Leave In Product Plus Keratin, so I changed from my usual keratin shampoo and conditioner to try this It's a 10 Miracle Shampoo Plus Keratin, and it's good...but not the best. I'll be switching back to my original favorite, Suave Professionals Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo, but I'm never getting rid of the It's a 10 Miracle Leave In, cause that stuff seriously changes your life.This shampoo was good, it does make hair smoother and a bit shinier, more manageable. I should explain that I've got a white-girl 'fro happening whenever I wash my hair with "normal" products, and I've learned over time to manage it. This shampoo is definitely a vast improvement to washing my hair with normal shampoo, but it's not quite as great as it could be. The hair is less weighed down, which can be good, but the ends tend to be a bit fly-away, though not truly static frizzy, with this shampoo. Overall, it's very good, but not good enough to de-throne the Suave Keratin Shampoo and Conditioner.By the way, if you haven't heard already, if you have frizzy, dry, unmanageable hair, it's best to "co-wash," as they call it. Put conditioner in your hair FIRST, on dry hair even, if you can manage it, and leave it in for at least a few minutes. I put conditioner on, finish the rest of my shower routine, and as the very last step, I use shampoo on my hair (just the roots/crown area, not the ponytail/ends area), and it makes a huge difference. I think that's one reason this set doesn't work as well for me, because it really wants the conditioner second like normal, and the results are good, but it just doesn't sink in and seal the cuticle with "good" moisture the way "co-washing" can.But I would still say give this a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this line!
reviews.reviewText: I love this line! I have switched to other products and methods on and off for a few years but I always come back to It's a 10! I had a situation where my hair was getting very dry and weak so I bought this line to help my hair. It has become stronger and softer! Now I am more confident my hair will be successful with growing longer. I was at a very well known store and saw their prices but could not buy from them. Buying online is a money saver! Shampoo smells great and I am literally happy every time I am washing my hair. Product arrived on time and bottle is working as expected.
